alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 18 at 8:37PM MST until February 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts between 60 and 75 mph. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles along I-25.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
